titles.title: Adoption Information Act

To amend title V of the Social Security Act to require assurances that certain family planning service projects and programs will provide pamphlets containing the contact information of adoption centers.
Adoption Information Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Adoption Information Act
This bill requires family planning service projects or programs that receive certain federal grants or contracts to provide individuals who inquire about their services with specified information related to adoption centers in their state. The Department of Health and Human Services must provide such projects and programs with pamphlets containing the required information.
